meanings.sent1: The fulsomeness of his compliments made her uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: Her fulsomeness towards the boss was obvious to everyone in the office.
meanings.sent3: The fulsomeness of his praise was so over-the-top that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The fulsomeness of her compliments was like a sugary dessert - too much sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The fulsomeness of his flattery was like drowning in a sea of insincerity.

meanings.sent1: She couldn't stand his fulsomeness and avoided him at all costs.
meanings.sent2: His fulsomeness attitude towards his superiors eventually led to his downfall.
meanings.sent3: The fulsomeness tone of his voice grated on her nerves.
meanings.sent4: The fulsomeness smile on her face hid her true feelings of annoyance.
meanings.sent5: The fulsomeness behavior of the salesman made customers wary of his intentions.

meanings.sent1: The fulsomeness smell coming from the garbage can made her gag.
meanings.sent2: The fulsomeness taste of the spoiled milk turned his stomach.
meanings.sent3: The fulsomeness sight of the decaying fruit made her feel queasy.
meanings.sent4: The fulsomeness appearance of the moldy bread made her lose her appetite.
meanings.sent5: The fulsomeness texture of the slimy fish made him feel nauseous.
